text: Say: 'My Lord forbids only indecencies, that is to say, the vices of the bestial faculty, and sin, and wrongful insolence, namely, the vices of the predatorial faculty, and that you associate, to the end [of the verse]: that is to say, the vices of the angelic rational-speech faculty, since these are ego-centric attributes that bar from the aforementioned adornments that are the human perfections that stand in contrareity to them.
